svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
January 7, 2023" date: "2023-01-07"
Eth News and Links
Shapella (Shanghai + Capella) upgrade
* Latest core devs execution call video . Summary by Tim Beiko . Notes from Tim
Beiko & Christine Kim : EOF removed from Shanghai to not delay withdrawals No other
EIPs being added e.g. EIP1153 (transient storage) Withdrawal-devnet-1 running with all
client combinations Contract devs : EIP3860 (limit & meter initcode) changing to error
with out of gas exception Discussion on including SSZ withdrawal roots on execution
layer for light clients
Latest core devs execution call video . Summary by Tim Beiko . Notes from Tim Beiko
& Christine Kim :
* EOF removed from Shanghai to not delay withdrawals
EOF removed from Shanghai to not delay withdrawals
* No other EIPs being added e.g. EIP1153 (transient storage)
No other EIPs being added e.g. EIP1153 (transient storage)
* Withdrawal-devnet-1 running with all client combinations
Withdrawal-devnet-1 running with all client combinations
* Contract devs : EIP3860 (limit & meter initcode) changing to error with out of gas
exception
Contract devs : EIP3860 (limit & meter initcode) changing to error with out of gas
* Discussion on including SSZ withdrawal roots on execution layer for light clients
Discussion on including SSZ withdrawal roots on execution layer for light clients
* Consensus specs v1.3.0-rc.0 : Capella specs feature complete & stable unless
unexpected issues
Consensus specs v1.3.0-rc.0 : Capella specs feature complete & stable unless
Cancun + D-starname upgrade
* EIP4844 (proto-danksharding) implementers call notes
EIP4844 (proto-danksharding) implementers call notes
* KZG ceremony: Security review [PDF] of sequencer in Rust & front end in React
Implementing powers of tau contributor Powers of Tau ceremony client in Go, optional
entropy from http endpoint & drand network
KZG ceremony:
* Security review [PDF] of sequencer in Rust & front end in React
Security review [PDF] of sequencer in Rust & front end in React
* Implementing powers of tau contributor
Implementing powers of tau contributor
* Powers of Tau ceremony client in Go, optional entropy from http endpoint & drand
network
Powers of Tau ceremony client in Go, optional entropy from http endpoint & drand
Layer 1
* Core devs & consensus calls renamed to core devs call execution (ACDE) & consensus
(ACDC)
Core devs & consensus calls renamed to core devs call execution (ACDE) & consensus
* Proposal for EOF v2 including Vitalik’s idea to ban code introspection
Proposal for EOF v2 including Vitalik’s idea to ban code introspection
* Mevboost.pics adds block builder slot share over time
Mevboost.pics adds block builder slot share over time
* ERC4337 (account abstraction) decentralized mempool working group notes
ERC4337 (account abstraction) decentralized mempool working group notes
Client releases
* Consensus Layer Lodestar v1.3.0 : networking & performance improvements and
keymanager API conformance
* Lodestar v1.3.0 : networking & performance improvements and keymanager API
conformance
Layer 2
* Options for zkEVMs to price gas
Options for zkEVMs to price gas
* L2beat: LayerZero bridge security is fundamentally a trusted model
L2beat: LayerZero bridge security is fundamentally a trusted model
EIPs/Standards
* EIP6212 : Buyable NFT tokens on-chain and royalties
EIP6212 : Buyable NFT tokens on-chain and royalties
* EIP6268 : Non transferability indicator for ERC1155
EIP6268 : Non transferability indicator for ERC1155
* EIP6269 : Full EVM equivalence
EIP6269 : Full EVM equivalence
This newsletter is made possible thanks to Tenderly ’s new Web3 Gateway !
The Tenderly platform enables Web3 developers to build, test, monitor, and operate
smart contracts in one place. To cover each aspect of the dapp development lifecycle,
Tenderly expanded its product offering and released Tenderly Web3 Gateway. This is a
production node as a service that delivers fast and easy access to the blockchain.
Tenderly Web3 Gateway is fully integrated with the rest of the platform, combining
infrastructure with development tooling and observability. It enables blockchain
developers to:
* Speed up read-heavy workloads up to eight times
Speed up read-heavy workloads up to eight times
* Set up reliable node infrastructure with 100% blockchain data consistency
Set up reliable node infrastructure with 100% blockchain data consistency
* Reduce node infrastructure management overhead
Reduce node infrastructure management overhead
* Scale dapps with ease to meet their growing user base
Scale dapps with ease to meet their growing user base
* Unify dapp development by combining infrastructure with tooling and observability
Unify dapp development by combining infrastructure with tooling and observability
* Improve development teams’ velocity and collaboration by eliminating development
silos
Improve development teams’ velocity and collaboration by eliminating development silos
* Preview transaction outcomes directly from Tenderly Web3 Gateway before sending them
on-chain
Preview transaction outcomes directly from Tenderly Web3 Gateway before sending them
Try Tenderly Web3 Gateway .
Stuff for developers
* Solidity compiler appends encoded IPFS hash of contract metadata to bytecode for
verification
Solidity compiler appends encoded IPFS hash of contract metadata to bytecode for
* Guide to using PrevRandao
Guide to using PrevRandao
* Paul Berg: Solidity supports functions as parameters , useful in testing e.g.
Seaport
Paul Berg: Solidity supports functions as parameters , useful in testing e.g.
* EVM quirks and how they are handled in Solidity & Vyper
EVM quirks and how they are handled in Solidity & Vyper
* Setup remixd to use Remix with local filesystem
Setup remixd to use Remix with local filesystem
* CTFs: Mr Steal Yo Crypto , uses Hardhat Making of HappyNewYear CTF Damn Vulnerable
DeFi backdoor solution Shop puzzle & solution Secureum bootcamp race-13 quiz solution
CTFs:
* Mr Steal Yo Crypto , uses Hardhat
Mr Steal Yo Crypto , uses Hardhat
* Making of HappyNewYear CTF
Making of HappyNewYear CTF
* Damn Vulnerable DeFi backdoor solution
Damn Vulnerable DeFi backdoor solution
* Shop puzzle & solution
Shop puzzle & solution
* Secureum bootcamp race-13 quiz solution
Secureum bootcamp race-13 quiz solution
* TurboETH : dapp build system, app template, ERC20 & ERC721 components & hooks, beta
TurboETH : dapp build system, app template, ERC20 & ERC721 components & hooks, beta
* Use TrueBlocks to find all contracts created by an address
Use TrueBlocks to find all contracts created by an address
* Guide to equivalence checking Solidity functionality with a reference implementation
using Z3 theorem prover
Guide to equivalence checking Solidity functionality with a reference implementation
* UniRep protocol : private & non-repudiable reputation system
UniRep protocol : private & non-repudiable reputation system
Security
* Circom-pairing library vulnerability disclosed, missing data validation
Ecosystem
* Ethereum.org Q1 website roadmap
Application layer
* OpenSea supports Arbitrum Nova and joins Data Availability Committee
OpenSea supports Arbitrum Nova and joins Data Availability Committee
* Coinbase cb.id ENS names : claimable via their mobile wallet or extension
Coinbase cb.id ENS names : claimable via their mobile wallet or extension
* Invisible NFTs : ENS-bound NFTs for use as avatars in ENS profile using CC-licensed
art
Invisible NFTs : ENS-bound NFTs for use as avatars in ENS profile using CC-licensed
* Proposal for ENS privacy using Aztec Network
Proposal for ENS privacy using Aztec Network
* Clique : attest Twitter account on OP Attestation Station
Clique : attest Twitter account on OP Attestation Station
Job Listings
* Status is hiring a Technical Writer for Waku Product , all other jobs here
Status is hiring a Technical Writer for Waku Product , all other jobs here
* Join a16z-backed Story Protocol as a founding smart contract developer .
Join a16z-backed Story Protocol as a founding smart contract developer .
* Ethereum Foundation seek a generalist ecosystem developer
Ethereum Foundation seek a generalist ecosystem developer
* Help Alchemy bring web3 to 1 billion people as a Customer Product Engineer .
Help Alchemy bring web3 to 1 billion people as a Customer Product Engineer .
Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit), payable in ETH/DAI/USDC to
abcoathup.eth on mainnet or Layer 2. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Regulation/business/tokens
* Biden administration reverses Trump administration's pro-stablecoin banking advisory
Biden administration reverses Trump administration's pro-stablecoin banking advisory
* NY Attorney General sues former Celsius CEO for defrauding investors
NY Attorney General sues former Celsius CEO for defrauding investors
* Bankruptcy judge ruled Celsius owns customer deposits in Earn [PDF] as per their
Terms of Use
Bankruptcy judge ruled Celsius owns customer deposits in Earn [PDF] as per their Terms
of Use
* Cameron Winklevoss publicly asks Barry Silbert to determine by January 8 how
DCG/Genesis will pay back $900 million to Gemini Earn customers
Cameron Winklevoss publicly asks Barry Silbert to determine by January 8 how
* US SEC objected to Binance's proposed $1 billion purchase of Voyager assets
US SEC objected to Binance's proposed $1 billion purchase of Voyager assets
* Coinbase settled with New York Department of Financial Services for $50 million
penalty & $50 million for compliance
Coinbase settled with New York Department of Financial Services for $50 million
* Mutant Ape Planet NFT creator charged with defrauding purchasers in rug pull
Mutant Ape Planet NFT creator charged with defrauding purchasers in rug pull
* Wyre winding down after failed acquisition by Bolt
Wyre winding down after failed acquisition by Bolt
General
* 200 million Twitter user profiles released , vulnerable Twitter API likely queried
using email addresses from other data breaches
200 million Twitter user profiles released , vulnerable Twitter API likely queried
* CircleCI warns users to rotate secrets after security incident
CircleCI warns users to rotate secrets after security incident
* Storj warrant canary wasn’t updated , architect advises sharing illegal content
could lead to a warrant
Storj warrant canary wasn’t updated , architect advises sharing illegal content could
lead to a warrant
* Remco: polynomial commitments benchmark to compare proof systems
Remco: polynomial commitments benchmark to compare proof systems
* Functional commitments : prove execution of a private program over public inputs
Functional commitments : prove execution of a private program over public inputs
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup
and @evan_van_ness to get most of the week’s news in real time.
Permalink for this week’s issue:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-january-7-2023
Upcoming Dates of Note
(new/changes in bold )
* Jan 8 – Solidity developer survey deadline
Jan 8 – Solidity developer survey deadline
* Jan 11 – Flashbots MEV Roast: Privacy
Jan 11 – Flashbots MEV Roast: Privacy
* Jan 17-31 – Gitcoin grants round
Jan 17-31 – Gitcoin grants round
* Jan 31 – KZG ceremony grants deadline
Jan 31 – KZG ceremony grants deadline
* Feb 24 - Mar 1 – ETHDenver BUIDLWeek
Feb 24 - Mar 1 – ETHDenver BUIDLWeek
* Mar 2-5 – ETHDenver Hackathon
Mar 2-5 – ETHDenver Hackathon
* Mar 10-29 – Scaling Ethereum (ETHGlobal) virtual
Mar 10-29 – Scaling Ethereum (ETHGlobal) virtual
* Mar 15-16 – ETHDubai
Mar 15-16 – ETHDubai
* Mar 16-18 – ETH Porto
Mar 16-18 – ETH Porto
* Mar 28-30 – Ethereum Rio
Mar 28-30 – Ethereum Rio
* Apr 3-6 – Edcon Vienna
Apr 3-6 – Edcon Vienna
* Apr 12-14 – NFT NYC
Apr 12-14 – NFT NYC
* Apr 14-16 – ETHGlobal Tokyo
Apr 14-16 – ETHGlobal Tokyo
* Apr 14-16 – ETHZurich conference
Apr 14-16 – ETHZurich conference
* May 26–28 – ETHGlobal Istanbul
May 26–28 – ETHGlobal Istanbul
* Jun 23–25 – ETHGlobal Toronto
Jun 23–25 – ETHGlobal Toronto
* Jul 17-20 – EthCC (Paris)
Jul 17-20 – EthCC (Paris)
* Jul 21–23 – ETHGlobal Paris
Jul 21–23 – ETHGlobal Paris
* Sep 22–24 – ETHGlobal New York
Sep 22–24 – ETHGlobal New York
* Oct 6–25 – ETHOnline (ETHGlobal) virtual
Oct 6–25 – ETHOnline (ETHGlobal) virtual
